Text: Steven Universe is an American animated television series created by Rebecca Sugar for Cartoon Network.

Text: Steven Universe:  It is the coming-of-age story of a young boy named Steven Universe (voiced by Zach Callison), who lives in the fictional town of Beach City with the "Crystal Gems" – Pearl (Deedee Magno), Garnet (Estelle), and Amethyst (Michaela Dietz), three magical humanoid aliens.
Triplets:<Steven Universe
2:
Text: Steven Universe:  Steven, who is half-Gem, goes on adventures with his friends and helps the Gems protect the world from their own kind.
